UserOptionDefinition.Device_SignalRemoteManager_V2_C.Cooldown: Determines how long the cooldown lasts after activating the Remote.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_SignalRemoteManager_V2_C.Signal R: Determines the rarity tier of signal remote this device is paired with.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_SignalRemoteManager_V2_C.RemoteSo: Determines whether the Device should play default SFX or not.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_SignalRemoteManager_V2_C.EnabledA: Determines whether the device is enabled when the game starts.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_SignalRemoteManager_V2_C.Activate: Determines whether we activate the event immediately when the player presses the input, or wait until the player's character presses the button.
UserOptionDefinition.B_Creative_TriggerGrenadeManager_C.Disab: Disables this device when receiving a signal on this channel.
UserOptionDefinition.B_Creative_TriggerGrenadeManager_C.Enabl: Enables this device when receiving a signal on this channel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_SignalRemoteManager_V2_C.On Prima: Send an Event when using primary fire.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_SignalRemoteManager_V2_C.On Secon: Send an Event when using secondary fire.
UserOptionDefinition.B_Creative_TriggerGrenadeManager_C.On Pr: Transmit on the selected channel when using primary fire.
UserOptionDefinition.B_Creative_TriggerGrenadeManager_C.On Se: Transmit on the selected channel when using secondary fire.
